effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

flavor_text_entries.text:
The best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. With it, you will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides
a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than
a Great Ball.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides
a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard
Poké Ball.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A device for catching wild Pokémon. It’s thrown like
a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating
its target.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A special Poké Ball that is used only in the
Great Marsh. It is recognizable by the camouflage
pattern decorating it.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is water- or bug-type, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more
effective when attempting to catch Water- or
Bug-type Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon was encountered by surfing or fishing, this ball has a catch rate of 3.5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3.5× when underwater, fishing, or surfing.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that works
especially well when catching Pokémon that
live underwater.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  Has a catch rate of given by `(40 - level) / 10`, where `level` is the wild Pokémon's level, to a maximum of 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon's level is higher than 30, this ball has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon, and drops steadily to 1× at level 30.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes more
effective the lower the level of the wild Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon's species is marked as caught in the trainer's Pokédex, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for previously-caught Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that works
especially well on a Pokémon species that has been
caught before.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  Has a catch rate of 1.1× on the first turn of the battle and increases by 0.1× every turn, to a maximum of 4× on turn 30.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes
progressively more effective the more turns that
are taken in battle.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.  Whenever the caught Pokémon's happiness increases, it increases by one extra point.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A particularly comfortable Poké Ball that makes a
wild Pokémon quickly grow friendlier after
being caught.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a
commemorative item used to celebrate an event of
some sort.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If it's currently nighttime or the wild Pokémon was encountered while walking in a cave, this ball has a catch rate of 3.5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.5× at night and in caves.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it
easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark
places like caves.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.  The caught Pokémon's HP is immediately restored, PP for all its moves is restored, and any status ailment is cured.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon are immediately healed.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A remedial Poké Ball that restores the HP of a
Pokémon caught with it and eliminates any
status conditions.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 4× on the first turn of a battle, but 1× any other time.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a more
successful catch rate if used at the start of a
wild encounter.

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A quite rare Poké Ball that has been crafted in
order to commemorate a special occasion of
some sort.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a friendly Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can
be used to restore 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures poison.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures poison.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for poisoning. It can be used
once to lift the effects of being poisoned from
a Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures a burn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures a burn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be
used once to heal a Pokémon suffering from a burn.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures freezing.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures freezing.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used
once to defrost a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures sleep.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures sleep.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine used against sleep. It can
be used once to rouse a Pokémon from the
clutches of sleep.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures paralysis.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures paralysis.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for paralysis. It can be used
once to free a Pokémon that has been paralyzed.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP
of a single Pokémon and heal any status conditions
it has.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP to full.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It will
completely restore the max HP of a single Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 200 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 200 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can
be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 50 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can
be used to restore 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective.
It can be used once to heal all the status conditions
of a Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Revives the Pokémon and restores half its HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives with half HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also
restores half of a fainted Pokémon’s maximum HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Revives the Pokémon and restores its HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives with full HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also
fully restores a fainted Pokémon’s maximum HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 50 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
Water with a high mineral content. When consumed,
it restores up to 30 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 60 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 60 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed,
it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 80 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 80 HP.

effect_entries.effect:

effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 100 HP.

A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed,

Used on a party Pokémon

A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed,

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 200 HP.  Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 200 HP, but lowers happiness.

An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed,
it restores up to 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon

A very bitter medicinal powder. It can be used once

effect_entries.effect:

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon

effect_entries.short_effect: Restores PP to full for one move.

This medicine can fully restore the PP of a single

a Pokémon.

Used on a party Pokémon

effect_entries.short_effect: Restores 10 PP for each move.

moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:

effect_entries.short_effect: Restores PP to full for each move.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment and confusion.
effect_entries.short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

Lavaridge Town’s local specialty. It can be used

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.

A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries.

injured Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used
:   Revives all fainted Pokémon in the party and restores their HP to full.
effect_entries.short_effect: Revives all fainted Pokémon with full HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
This rare ash can revive all fainted Pokémon in a
party. In doing so, it also fully restores their
maximum HP.

effect_entries.effect:

effect_entries.effect:

In Diamond and Pearl, trade ten for a sunny day TM in the house midway along the southern section of sinnoh route 212.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on sinnoh route 212, in snowpoint city, and in the survival area.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a cheri berry, a leppa berry, and a pecha berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in violet city.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a persim berry, a pomeg berry, and a razz berry with the Juggler near the pal park entrance in fuchsia city.

some sort of implement made long ago.

Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 200 steps.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer
than Repel.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer
than Super Repel.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Transports the trainer to the last-entered dungeon entrance.  Cannot be used outside, in buildings, or in distortion world, sinnoh hall of origin 1, spear pillar, or turnback cave.
effect_entries.short_effect: Transports user to the outside entrance of a cave.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A long and durable rope. Use it to escape instantly
from a cave or a dungeon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 100 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 100 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a cottonee into whimsicott, a gloom into bellossom, a petilil into lilligant, or a sunkern into sunflora.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Cottonee into Whimsicott, a Gloom into Bellossom, a Petilil into Lilligant, or a Sunkern into Sunflora.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a clefairy into clefable, a jigglypuff into wigglytuff, a munna into musharna, a nidorina into nidoqueen, a nidorino into nidoking, or a skitty into delcatty.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Clefairy into Clefable, a Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, a Munna into Musharna, a Nidorina into Nidoqueen, a Nidorino into Nidoking, or a Skitty into Delcatty.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into flareon, a growlithe into arcanine, a pansear into simisear, or a vulpix into ninetales.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Flareon, a Growlithe into Arcanine, a Pansear into Simisear, or a Vulpix into Ninetales.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. The stone has a fiery
orange heart.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eelektrik into eelektross, an eevee into jolteon, or a pikachu into raichu.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eelektrik into Eelektross, an Eevee into Jolteon, or a Pikachu into Raichu.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It has a distinct
thunderbolt pattern.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of
clear water.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an exeggcute into exeggutor, a gloom into vileplume, a nuzleaf into shiftry, a pansage into simisage, or a weepinbell into victreebel.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Exeggcute into Exeggutor, a Gloom into Vileplume, a Nuzleaf into Shiftry, a Pansage into Simisage, or a Weepinbell into Victreebel.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable
leaf pattern.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A very small and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a
certain class of collectors and sought out by them.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 2500 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 5000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A very large and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a
certain class of collectors and sought out by them.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A rather small pearl that has a very nice silvery
sheen to it. It can be sold cheaply to shops.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A rather large pearl that has a very nice silvery
sheen. It can be sold to shops for a high price.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 1000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 2000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
Lovely red sand that flows between the fingers
with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a low price
to shops.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Platinum: Trade for one of each color Shard. Black and White: Trade for PP Up. Sell for 4900 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 9800 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A small shard of a beautiful gem that demonstrates
a distinctly red sparkle. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.

effect_entries.effect: Vendor trash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A nugget of the purest gold that gives off a
lustrous gleam in direct light. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

effect_entries.effect: Trade one to the Move Relearner near the shore in pastoria city or with the Move Deleter in blackthorn city to teach one party Pokémon a prior level-up move.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for prior Level-up moves.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely
rare. Some people are happy to receive one.

effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Immediately triggers a wild Pokémon battle, as long as the trainer is somewhere with wild Pokémon—i.e., in tall grass, in a cave, or surfing.

Can be smeared on sweet-smelling trees to attract tree-dwelling Pokémon after six hours.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that attracts wild
Pokémon when it is used in tall grass, in caves, or
on special trees.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a patch of soil
:   Plant's growth stages will each last 25% less time.  Dries soil out more quickly.
effect_entries.short_effect: Growing time of berries is reduced, but the soil dries out faster.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a patch of soil
:   Plant's growth stages will each last 25% more time.  Dries soil out more slowly.
effect_entries.short_effect: Growing time of berries is increased, but the soil dries out slower.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a patch of soil
:   Fully-grown plant will last 25% longer before dying and possibly regrowing.
effect_entries.short_effect: Berries stay on the plant for longer than their usual time.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.

effect_entries.effect:
Used on a path of soil
:   Plant will regrow after dying 25% more times.
effect_entries.short_effect: Berries regrow from dead plants an increased number of times.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a lileep.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Lileep.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived
in the sea. It looks as if it could be part of a
plant’s root.

effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Anorith.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived
in the sea. It appears to be a fragment of a claw.

effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Omanyte.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived
in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a kabuto.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Kabuto.

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a aerodactyl.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Aerodactyl.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A piece of amber that still contains the genetic

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a shieldon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Shieldon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived

effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a cranidos.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Cranidos.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived

effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Bone Man for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A rare bone that is extremely valuable for the

high price to shops.

effect_entries.effect:
Held by happiny
:   Holder evolves into chansey when it levels up during the daytime.
effect_entries.short_effect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of

effect_entries.effect: Place in the tower on sinnoh route 209.  Check the stone to encounter a spiritomb, as long as the trainer's Underground status card counts at least 32 greetings.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use on the tower on Route 209 to encounter Spiritomb if you have at least 32 Underground greetings.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower
from collapsing. Voices can be heard from
it occasionally.

effect_entries.effect:
Held by dialga
:   Holder's dragon- and steel-type moves have 1.2× their usual power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts the damage from Dialga's Dragon-type and Steel-type moves by 20%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga.
It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type
moves when it is held.

effect_entries.effect:
Held by palkia
:   Holder's dragon- and water-type moves have 1.2× their usual power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts the damage from Palkia's Dragon-type and Water-type moves by 20%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia.
It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type
moves when it is held.

:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Attack.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, its Attack stat will increase when it’s in
a pinch.

:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its critical hit chance by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, its critical-hit ratio will increase when it’s
in a pinch.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise a random stat by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost a random stat by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, one of its stats will sharply increase
when it’s in a pinch.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder takes super-effective damage, it consumes this item to restore 1/4 its max HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective attack to restore 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, being hit by a supereffective attack will
restore its HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item, and its next used move has 1.2× its normal accuracy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost accuracy of next move by 20%. (Gen IV: Perfect accuracy)

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, its accuracy will increase just once when
it’s in a pinch.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item.  On the following turn, the holder will act first among moves with the same priority, regardless of Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP when using a move to go first.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, it will be able to move first just once
when it’s in a pinch.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder takes physical damage, it consumes this item to damage the attacking Pokémon for 1/8 its max HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to deal 1/8 attacker's max HP when holder is struck by a physical attack.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a physical
attack hits the Pokémon holding it, the attacker will
also be hurt.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder takes special damage, it consumes this item to damage the attacking Pokémon for 1/8 its max HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to deal 1/8 attacker's max HP when holder is struck by a special attack.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a special
attack hits the Pokémon holding it, the attacker will
also be hurt.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Moves targeting the holder have 0.9× chance to hit.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases the holder's evasion by 1/9 (11 1/9%).

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky
glare that lowers the opposing
Pokémon’s accuracy.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   At the end of each turn, if any of the holder's stats have a negative stat modifier, the holder consumes this item to remove the modifiers from those stats.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Resets all lowered stats to normal at end of turn. Consumed after use.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any
lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead.

Held in battle
:   Holder has half its Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy
brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed
in battle.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   Experience is split across two groups: Pokémon who participated in battle, and Pokémon holding this item.  Each Pokémon earns experience as though it had battled alone, divided by the number of Pokémon in its group, then divided by the number of groups. Pokémon holding this item who also participated in battle effectively earn experience twice.

    Fainted Pokémon never earn experience, and empty groups are
ignored; thus, if a single Pokémon is holding this item and the only Pokémon who battled faints from explosion, the holder will gain full experience.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Half the experience from a battle is split between Pokémon holding this item.

flavor_text_entries.text:
Turning on this special device will allow all the
Pokémon on your team to receive Exp. Points
from battles.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Whenever the holder attempts to use a move, it has a 3/16 chance to act first among moves with the same priority.  If multiple Pokémon have this effect at the same time, Speed is the tie-breaker as normal, but the effect of trick room is ignored.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder has a 3/16 (18.75%) chance to move first.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This light, sharp
claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would earn happiness for any reason, it earns twice that amount instead.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the happiness earned by the holder.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting
chime of this bell calms the holder, making
it friendly.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is attracted, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder
shakes off move-binding effects to move freely.
It can be used only once.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder has 1.5× its Attack.  When the holder attempts to use a move, all its other moves are disabled until it leaves battle or loses this item.

    The restriction ends even if this item is swapped for another Choice item
via trick or switcheroo.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious
headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of
one move.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make their target flinch.  This chance applies independently to each hit of a multi-hit move.

    This item's chance is rolled independently of any other move effects;
e.g., a move with a 30% chance to flinch normally will have a 37% total chance to flinch when used with this item, because 3% of the time, both effects activate.

Held by poliwhirl or slowbro
:   Holder evolves into politoed or slowking, respectively, when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Traded on a Poliwhirl: Holder evolves into Politoed. Traded on a Slowpoke: Holder evolves into Slowking.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder
successfully inflicts damage, the target may
also flinch.

effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder's bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a shiny
silver powder that will boost the power of
Bug-type moves.

effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   If the holder participated in a trainer battle, the trainer earns twice the usual prize money.  This effect applies even if the holder fainted.

    This effect does not stack with any other similar effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the money earned from a battle. Does not stack with Luck Incense.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any
prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins
a battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held by lead Pokémon: Prevents wild battles with Pokémon that are lower level than the holder.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep
wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of
the party.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder's Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios's Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A wondrous orb to be held by either Latios or
Latias. It raises the power of Psychic- and
Dragon-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder's Special Attack.  Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Clamperl's Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a
sharp silver and raises the holder’s Sp. Atk stat.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder's Special Defense.  Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Clamperl's Special Defense. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Gorebyss.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines
with a faint pink and raises the holder’s
Sp. Def stat.

effect_entries.effect: Held: In wild battles, attempts to run away on the holder's turn will always succeed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Allows the Holder to escape from any wild battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the
holder to flee from any wild Pokémon encounter
without fail.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Prevents the holder from evolving naturally.  Evolution initiated by the trainer (Stones, etc) will still work.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Prevents level-based evolution from occuring.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon
holding this peculiar stone is prevented
from evolving.

effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder is attacked for regular damage that would faint it, this item has a 10% chance to prevent the holder's HP from lowering below 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder has 10% chance to survive attacks or self-inflicted damage at 1 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may
endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just
1 HP.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases any Exp the holder gains by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases EXP earned in battle by 50%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s an egg filled
with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points
in battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit ratio by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a lens for
scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder’s
critical-hit ratio.

effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Steel moves by 20%.
Held by Onix or Scyther: Evolves the holder into Steelix or Scizor when traded, respectively.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a special
metallic film that can boost the power of
Steel-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder's max HP at the end of each turn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP
is slowly but steadily restored throughout
every battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A very tough and inflexible scale. Dragon-type
Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Pikachu: Doubles the holder's initial Attack and Special Attack.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Pikachu's Attack and Special Attack. Breed on Pikachu or Raichu: Pichu Egg will have Volt Tackle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by Pikachu. It’s a puzzling orb
that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Ground moves by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Ground-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:

effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Marill or Azumarill beget an Azurill Egg.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder's Evasion by 5%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's evasion is increased by 5%. Breeding: Wobbuffet begets a Wynaut Egg.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling

effect_entries.effect: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Chansey's critical hit ratio by two stages.

An item to be held by Chansey. This pair of lucky
boxing gloves will boost Chansey’s critical-hit ratio.

effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Ditto's Defense and Special Defense by 50%. The boost is lost after transforming.

An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet

effect_entries.effect: Held by Cubone or Marowak: Doubles the holder's Attack.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the accuracy of any move the holder uses by 10% (multiplied; i.e. 70% accuracy is increased to 77%).
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Provides a 1/10 (10%) boost in accuracy to the holder.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a magnifying
lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's physical moves by 10%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of physical moves used by the holder by 10%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband
exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of
physical moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's special moves by 10%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of special moves used by the holder by 1/10 (10%).

An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of
glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held: When the holder hits with a super-effective move, its power is raised by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's Super Effective moves do 20% extra damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a well-worn
belt that slightly boosts the power of
supereffective moves.

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Reflect and Light Screen will create effects lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the barrier itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder last 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves
like Light Screen and Reflect will be
effective longer.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Damage from the holder's moves is increased by 30%.  On each turn the holder uses a damage-inflicting move, it takes 10% its max HP in damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's moves inflict 30% extra damage, but cost 10% max HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the
power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on
each hit.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Whenever the holder uses a move that requires a turn to charge first (Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Razor Wind, Skull Bash, Sky Attack, or Solarbeam), this item is consumed and the charge is skipped.  Skull Bash still provides a Defense boost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Both turns of a two-turn charge move happen at once. Consumed upon use.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It
allows the holder to immediately use a move that
normally requires a turn to charge.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Badly poisons the holder at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Inflicts Toxic on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Poison damage would occur.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a bizarre orb
that will badly poison the holder during battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Burns the holder at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Inflicts Burn on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Burn damage would occur.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a bizarre orb
that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.

effect_entries.effect: Held by Ditto: Doubles the holder's initial Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Ditto's Speed when held. The boost is lost after transforming.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet
hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder has full HP and is attacked for regular damage that would faint it, this item is consumed and prevents the holder's HP from lowering below 1.  This effect works against multi-hit attacks, but does not work against the effects of Doom Desire or Future Sight.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder survives any single-hit attack at 1 HP if at max HP, then the item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has
full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with
1 HP. The item then disappears.

effect_entries.effect:
Held: Raises the holder's Accuracy by 20% when it goes last.
Ingame description is incorrect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Provides a 1/5 (20%) boost in accuracy if the holder moves after the target.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
moves after its target moves, its accuracy will
be boosted.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Each time the holder uses the same move consecutively, its power is increased by another 10% of its original, to a maximum of 100%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consectutive uses of the same attack have a cumulative damage boost of 10%. Maximum 100% boost.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves
used consecutively, but only until a different move
is used.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  If the holder is Flying or has Levitate, it takes regular damage from Ground attacks and is suspectible to Spikes and Toxic Spikes.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's Speed is halved. Negates all Ground-type immunities, and makes Flying-types take neutral damage from Ground-type moves. Arena Trap. Spikes, and Toxic Spikes affect the holder.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed
and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying-type
and levitating holders.

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder will go last within its move's priority bracket, regardless of Speed.  If multiple Pokémon within the same priority bracket are subject to this effect, the slower Pokémon will go first.  The holder will move after Pokémon with Stall.  If the holder has Stall, Stall is ignored.  This item ignores Trick Room.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder moves last in its priority bracket.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously
heavy and makes the holder move slower
than usual.

effect_entries.effect: Held: When the holder becomes Attracted, the Pokémon it is Attracted to becomes Attracted back.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Infatuates opposing Pokémon when holder is inflicted with infatuation.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will
be, too.

effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder is Poison-type, restores 1/16 max HP at the end of each turn.  Otherwise, damages the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Poison-type holder recovers 1/16 (6.25%) max HP each turn. Non-Poison-Types take 1/8 (12.5%) max HP damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually
restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages
any other type.

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Hail will create a hailstorm lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the weather itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Hail by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the
duration of the move Hail when used by
the holder.

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Sandstorm will create a sandstorm lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the weather itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Sandstorm by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the

the holder.

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Sunny Day will create sunshine lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the weather itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Sunny Day by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Rain Dance will create rain lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the weather itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Rain Dance by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the

the holder.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the duration of the holder's multiturn (2-5 turn) moves by three turns.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's multi-turn trapping moves last 5 turns.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the
duration of multi-turn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the holder's Speed by 50%, but restricts it to the first move it uses until it leaves battle or loses this item.  If this item is swapped for another Choice item via Trick or Switcheroo, the holder's restriction is still lifted, but it will again be restricted to the next move it uses.
(Quirk: If the holder is switched in by U-Turn and it also knows U-Turn, U-Turn becomes its restricted move.)
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases Speed by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious
scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of
one move.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Damaged the holder for 1/8 its max HP.  When the holder is struck by a contact move, damages the attacker for 1/8 its max HP; if the attacker is not holding an item, it will take this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder takes 1/8 (12.5%) its max HP at the end of each turn. When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/8 its max HP in damage and receive the item if not holding one.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It damages the
holder every turn and may latch on to Pokémon
that touch the holder.

effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Attack effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Attack effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed
but allows the holder’s Attack stat to grow more
after battling.

flavor_text_entries.text:

effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 HP effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder is unaffected by any moves or abilities that would prevent it from actively leaving battle.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder can bypass all trapping effects and switch out. Multi-turn moves still cannot be switched out of.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded

effect_entries.effect: Held: HP restored from Absorb, Aqua Ring, Drain Punch, Dream Eater, Giga Drain, Ingrain, Leech Life, Leech Seed, and Mega Drain is increased by 30%.  Damage inflicted is not affected.

This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

The user soars and then strikes its target on the
next turn.

effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Psych Up to a compatible Pokémon.

change made by the target.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Captivate to a compatible Pokémon.

The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

This attack always results in a critical hit.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.

effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

a battle against a single Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Natural Gift to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Work Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Natural Gift)

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.

own HP.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.

move’s power.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.

The user enrages and confuses the target.

Attack stat.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.

While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of
the moves it knows.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches U-Turn to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon.

After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.

The user makes a copy of itself using some of its

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

The user gathers all its light energy and releases it

Sp. Def stat.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.

The user creates a bizarre area in which slower

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon.

This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.

The user soars and then strikes its target on the
next turn. This can also be used to fly to any
familiar town.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.

The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.

effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.

The target is slugged with a punch thrown at

heavy boulders.

The user charges at the target and may make it
flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat. This move can also
shatter rocks in the field.

effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and
attacks on the next turn.

effect_entries.effect: Teaches Rock Climb to a compatible Pokémon.

A charging attack that may also leave
the foe confused. It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.

effect_entries.effect: Sends the trainer to the Underground.  Only usable outside.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows visiting the Underground.

A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring.
It provides access to the Underground in the
Sinnoh region.

effect_entries.effect: Unused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Carries coal mine loot.

A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry any
treasures or loot obtained in the coal mine.

effect_entries.effect: Unused.
effect_entries.short_effect: List of battle types and their rules.

flavor_text_entries.text:
It lists the rules for holding battles.
For Link Battles, you may choose which set of rules
you wish to use.

effect_entries.effect: Designates several nearby patches of grass as containing Pokémon, some of which may be special radar-only Pokémon.  Successive uses in a certain way create chains of encounters with the same species; longer chains increase the chance that a shiny Pokémon of that species will appear.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to track down rare or shiny Pokémon. 50 steps to recharge.

A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding
in the tall grass. Its battery is recharged as
you walk.

effect_entries.effect: Tracks Battle Points.
effect_entries.short_effect: Keeps count of Battle Points earned.

A card that lists how many Battle Points you
have earned.

effect_entries.short_effect: Records prior significant activities the player took.

A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your

exteriors of Poké Balls.

effect_entries.effect: Contains Pokémon Accessories.
effect_entries.short_effect: Holds Pokémon Accessories for use in Contests.

A lovely case to store colorful Props for your
Pokémon to wear in a musical.

effect_entries.effect: Unused.

A tiny bag that can hold 10 Seals for decorating
Poké Balls.

effect_entries.short_effect: Use to record Friend Codes and check your own.

A convenient notepad that is used to register your
Friends and friend codes and keep a record of
your gameplay.

A large key for operating the doors of the

a Team Galactic Grunt.

effect_entries.effect: Given to Cynthia's grandmother to get the Surf HM.

An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon
bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.

effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.

punishment, apparently.

effect_entries.effect: Unused.

A mythical chain that is said to link the
Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.

A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime.
It even shows you your present location in
the region.

effect_entries.short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it at any
body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

effect_entries.short_effect: Used to water berries.

effect_entries.short_effect: Opens a locked building in the Lakeside Resort.

effect_entries.short_effect: Allows access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.

50 years ago.

effect_entries.short_effect: Allows entry into the Hall of Origin. Unreleased.

A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not

Allows passage on a ferry.

effect_entries.effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows participation in Pokémon Contests.

Causes Heatran to appear at Reversal Mountain.

Unused prior to Black and White 2.

A stone formed by boulders melting in intensely hot

inside it.

A parcel entrusted into your care. You’re supposed

Twinleaf Town.

A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch—
Pokétch for short. Three coupons are needed.

The key to Team Galactic’s sinister
warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.

A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in
Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of
any ailment.

effect_entries.effect:
Held by giratina
:   Holder's dragon and ghost moves have 1.2× their base power.

    Holder is in Origin Forme.

This item cannot be held by any Pokémon but Giratina.  When you enter the Union Room or connect to Wi-Fi, this item returns to your bag.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts the damage from Giratina's Dragon-type and Ghost-type moves by 20%, and transforms it into Origin Forme.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the
power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves when it
is held.

Optionally records wireless, Wi-Fi, and Battle Frontier battles.

Tracks Battle Points earned in the Battle Frontier, and stores commemorative prints.

An amazing device that can record a battle
between friends or the battles at certain special
battle facilities.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer on a shaymin
:   Changes the target Shaymin from Land Forme to Sky Forme.

    This item cannot be used on a frozen Shaymin or at night.  Sky Forme Shaymin will revert to Land Forme overnight, when frozen, and upon entering a link battle.  This item must be used again to change it back.
effect_entries.short_effect: Changes an unfrozen Shaymin to Sky Forme in the day.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey
gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.

Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom's form.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom's appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific

a door.

effect_entries.short_effect: Holds Apricorns.

Handy containers for cultivating Berries wherever

Required to water berries within the berry pots.

Required to battle the sudowoodo on johto route 36.

This item cannot be directly used from the bag.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use on Sudowoodo blocking the path on Route 36. Also waters berries.

flavor_text_entries.text: A bottle used for watering plants in the Berry Pots.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the wild Pokémon was encountered by fishing, the wild Pokémon's catch rate is 3× normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: 3× effectiveness while fishing. Made from Blu Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Poké Ball that is good for catching Pokémon that
you reel in with a rod while out fishing.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the trainer's Pokémon's level is higher than:

    * four times the wild Pokémon's, the wild Pokémon's catch rate is 8× normal.
    * than twice the wild Pokémon's, the wild Pokémon's catch rate is 4× normal.
    * the wild Pokémon's, the wild Pokémon's catch rate is 2× normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: Success rate based off of fraction target Pokémon is of user's Pokémon. Made from Red Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon
that are at a lower level than your own Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the wild Pokémon is a clefairy, nidoran m, nidoran f, jigglypuff, skitty, or any evolution thereof, the wild Pokémon has 4× its catch rate.
effect_entries.short_effect: 4× effectiveness on familes of Pokémon with a Moon Stone evolution. Made from Ylw Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Poké Ball that will make it easier to catch
Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by a trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the wild Pokémon weighs:

    * 409.6 kg (903.0 lb) or more, its catch rate is 40 more than normal.
    * 307.2 kg (677.3 lb) or more, its catch rate is 30 more than normal.
    * 204.8 kg (451.5 lb) or more, its catch rate is 20 more than normal.
    * less than 204.8 kg (451.5 lb), its catch rate is 20 less than normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has flat bonus or penalty to catch rate depending on weight class of target. Made from Blk Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A Poké Ball that is better than usual at catching
very heavy Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect:
Used by a trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

:   If the wild Pokémon's base speed is 100 or more, its catch rate is 4× normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: 4× effectiveness on Pokémon with 100 or greater base speed. (Gen II: Roaming or Fleeing Pokémon). Made from Wht Apricorn.

A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon
